function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective antiviral drug and vaccine","Impact":"High risk of uncontrolled disease spread","Mitigation":"Investment in research for antiviral drug and vaccine development","Technologies":"Biotechnology, nanotechnology","People":"Scientific community, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Agglomeration problems with GBNs","Impact":"Reduced antimicrobial properties of GBNs","Mitigation":"Incorporation of metal ions/oxides in the form of nanoparticles (NPs) to modify surface properties","Technologies":"Nanotechnology","People":"Research community, manufacturers","Owner":"Research institutions, nanotechnology companies"},{"Description":"Potential misuse of mist spray and surface cleaner wipes","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Clear guidelines on proper use and application of mist spray and surface cleaner wipes","Technologies":"Education and awareness programs","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, regulatory bodies"}]}
